tr_quotes.quote: Acı bilgidir.
tr_quotes.author: Byron

tr_quotes.quote: lstırap çekerek çok şey öğreniyorum.
tr_quotes.author: Goethe

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanın alışamayacağı acı yoktur.
tr_quotes.author: Gabriel de Annunzio

tr_quotes.quote: Acıların en büyüğü kendini suçlu hissetmektir.
tr_quotes.author: Jane Austen

tr_quotes.quote: Acının bağladığı sevgi kuvvetlidir.
tr_quotes.author: Selma Fagerlöf

tr_quotes.quote: Sınanmadığınız bir acı üzerine konuşmak kolaydır.
tr_quotes.author: Tarık Tufan

tr_quotes.quote: lstırabı belli etmeyen onu yarı yarıya mağlup etmiştir.
tr_quotes.author: Rıfat Necdet Evrimer

tr_quotes.quote: En tatlı şarkılar en acı duyguları dile getirenlerdir.
tr_quotes.author: P. B. Shelley

tr_quotes.quote: Acı çekmek kaçınılmazdır acılardan yakınmak ise kişinin kendi seçimidir.
tr_quotes.author: Art Clanin

tr_quotes.quote: Geçmişte çektiklerimiz, bize çekmekte olduğumuz acılardan daima daha hafif görünür.
tr_quotes.author: Gabriel de Annunzio

tr_quotes.quote: Yardıma çağırdığım şey acılardır; çünkü onlar dosttur ve iyi öğütler verirler.
tr_quotes.author: Goethe

tr_quotes.quote: Düş kırıklıkları, aşağılamalar ve hatalardan alınan dersler, insanda bin ustanın öğretisinden daha derin izler bırakır.
tr_quotes.author: John Heinrich Fussli

tr_quotes.quote: Her ıstırabınız için, her acı için, imanla daha güçlü olduğunuzu unutmayın.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İnsana en çok acı veren şey, söylemek istedikleriyle söyledikleri arasındaki uçurumdur
tr_quotes.author: Dostoyevski

tr_quotes.quote: Hayatta hiç acı çekmeyen, gerçekten yaşamak nasıl bir şey olduğunu bilemez.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bütün acılar azalır, yeter ki ekmeğin olsun.
tr_quotes.author: Cervantes

tr_quotes.quote: Kendi acılarımızdan başkalarının acılarını paylaşmayı öğreneceğiz
tr_quotes.author: Goethe

tr_quotes.quote: Hiçbir acı sonsuza dek sürmez.
tr_quotes.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

tr_quotes.quote: En büyük korkularınız ıstırabınızın ana nedeni olabilir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Acı da olsa doğruyu söyleyiniz.
tr_quotes.author: Hz. Muhammed

tr_quotes.quote: Bazı acılar, ilaç yerine geçer
tr_quotes.author: Wiliam Shakespeare

tr_quotes.quote: Acı, akıllı insanların hocasıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Lord Byron

tr_quotes.quote: Acı çekmekten korkan, zaten korktuğu için acı çekiyordur.
tr_quotes.author: Montaigne

tr_quotes.quote: Dünyada iki tip acı vardır. Biri sizi incitir, diğeri ise değiştirir
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Gözyaşlarımızdan asla utanmamalıyız.
tr_quotes.author: Charles Dickens

tr_quotes.quote: Bilgeliğin yolu acı çekmekten geçer.
tr_quotes.author: Robert Gary Lee

tr_quotes.quote: Acı çekmek acıdan değil, acıya direnmektendir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Tüm derslerinizi alana kadar sevincinizi ertelemeyin. Sevinç sizin dersinizdir.
tr_quotes.author: Alan Cohen

tr_quotes.quote: Kendinize acıdan bir kimlik oluşturduğunuz sürece, ondan kurtulamazsınız.
tr_quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

tr_quotes.quote: Dünya ıstırap çekenlerle doludur. Aynı zamanda baş edenlerle de doludur.
tr_quotes.author: Helen Keller

tr_quotes.quote: Kendinize saygı duyun, sabırlı ve merhametli olun. Bunlarla, her şeyin üstesinden gelebilirsiniz.
tr_quotes.author: Jack Kornfield

tr_quotes.quote: Başkalarının fikirlerine ve hareketlerine bağışıksan, gereksiz acıların kurbanı olmazsın.
tr_quotes.author: Miguel Ruiz

tr_quotes.quote: Hislerinizi gösterdiğiniz için asla özür dilemeyin. Böyle yaparak, gerçek için özür dilemiş olursunuz.
tr_quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

tr_quotes.quote: Aklın huzuru hayattaki çatışmaların yokluğu değil, onunla baş etme yeteneğidir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Acı çekmemize sebep, başımıza gelen değildir; başımıza gelenle ilgili kendimize ne söylediğimizdir
tr_quotes.author: Pema Chodron

tr_quotes.quote: Acımızı kucaklamalı ve yolculuğumuzda yakıt olarak kullanmalıyız.
tr_quotes.author: Kenji Miyazawa

tr_quotes.quote: Hayat size acıyı kendisi verecektir. Sorumluluğunuz sevinci yaratmaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Milton Erickson

tr_quotes.quote: Hissetmediğiniz bir şeyi kendinize zorla hissettiremezsiniz, ama hislerinize rağmen doğruyu yapabilirsiniz.
tr_quotes.author: Pearl S. Buck

tr_quotes.quote: Hiç acı çekmemek, hiç acıdan kurtulmamaktır
tr_quotes.author: Edgar Allen Poe

tr_quotes.quote: Nasıl hatırladığımız, ne hatırladığımız ve neden hatırladığımız bireyselliğimizin en kişisel haritasını oluşturur.
tr_quotes.author: Christina Baldwin

tr_quotes.quote: Arama, araştırma, sorma, kapısını çalma, talep etme; rahatla. Rahatlarsan, gelir. Rahatlarsan, oradadır. Rahatlarsan, onunla birlikte hissetmeye başlarsın.
tr_quotes.author: Osho

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanın çektiği acının büyük bölümü gereksizdir. Zihin hayatınızı yönettiği sürece acıyı yaratırsınız.
tr_quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

tr_quotes.quote: Geçmiş ne kadar zor olursa olsun, her zaman tekrar başlayabilirsin.
tr_quotes.author: Buddha

tr_quotes.quote: Umut, sahip olduğunuz hissin daimi olmadığı hissidir.
tr_quotes.author: Joan Kerr

tr_quotes.quote: Şikayet etmek aptallıktır. Ya harekete geç ya da unut.
tr_quotes.author: Stefan Sagmeister

tr_quotes.quote: Bir yanlışı hatırlamak, aklınızda bir yük taşımak gibidir.
tr_quotes.author: Buddha

tr_quotes.quote: Istırap öğretir.
tr_quotes.author: Aesop

tr_quotes.quote: Duyduğum acıyı göstermemek yetmiyordu, acı duymamak gerekiyordu.
tr_quotes.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

tr_quotes.quote: Acı da olsa doğruyu söyleyiniz.
tr_quotes.author: Hz. Muhammed

tr_quotes.quote: Bazı acılar ilaç yerine geçer.
tr_quotes.author: Shakespeare

tr_quotes.quote: Istırap hakikatin yoludur.
tr_quotes.author: Andre Maurois

tr_quotes.quote: Acı akıllı insanların hocasıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Lord Byron

tr_quotes.quote: Her ıstırabın öğrettiği bir şey vardır.
tr_quotes.author: Balzac

tr_quotes.quote: Acıda hazların en tatlısı saklıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Dostoyevski

tr_quotes.quote: lstırap çekmemiş bir ruh saadetten ne anlar.
tr_quotes.author: George Sand

tr_quotes.quote: lstırap hayatı ve seciyeleri yükseltir.
tr_quotes.author: Denis Amiel

tr_quotes.quote: Kendi acımız bize başkalarınınkini bölüşmeyi öğretir.
tr_quotes.author: Goethe

tr_quotes.quote: Acının bağladığı sevgi kuvvetlidir.
tr_quotes.author: Selma Fagerlöf

tr_quotes.quote: Acıların en acısı kendi kendimize çektirdiğimizdir.
tr_quotes.author: Sophokles

tr_quotes.quote: Büyük acılar kadar bizi olgunlaştıran bir şey yoktur.
tr_quotes.author: Alfred de Musset

tr_quotes.quote: Sınanmadığınız bir acı üzerine konuşmak kolaydır.
tr_quotes.author: Tarık Tufan

tr_quotes.quote: Dünkü acılar bugünkü sevinçlerin kaynağını oluşturur.
tr_quotes.author: Pollok

tr_quotes.quote: Hangi acı sevmenin verdiği acıdan daha asil daha değerlidir ki...
tr_quotes.author: George Sand

tr_quotes.quote: lstırap çekiyorum ama tek mustarip ben değilim.
tr_quotes.author: Denis Diderot

tr_quotes.quote: Katlanmayı bilen için hiçbir acı önemli değildir.
tr_quotes.author: François Rene de Chateaubriand

tr_quotes.quote: İçiniz kor gibi yanarken susmak acıların en beteridir.
tr_quotes.author: Garcia Lorca

tr_quotes.quote: Acıların en gizlileri dayanılması en zor olanlardır.
tr_quotes.author: Honore de Balzac

tr_quotes.quote: Yardıma çağırdığım şey acılardır çünkü onlar dosttur ve iyi öğütler verir.
tr_quotes.author: Goethe

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanlar akılsızlıkları yüzünden alınlarında yazılı olandan daha çok acı çekerler.
tr_quotes.author: Eflatun

tr_quotes.quote: Hayatına ileride sana acı çektirebilecek hiçbir şeyi katma.
tr_quotes.author: Emile Zola

tr_quotes.quote: Yoksulluk ıstırapların en korkuncudur fakat kabiliyetleri doğuran da odur.
tr_quotes.author: Samuel Smiles

tr_quotes.quote: Acı çekmeyenler başkalarının acı çekebileceğini akıllarına bile getirmezler.
tr_quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

tr_quotes.quote: Cihanda en büyük yetim, iştirak edilmeyen ıstıraptır.
tr_quotes.author: Raif Necdet Kestelli

tr_quotes.quote: Büyük insan mustarip olduğu zamanda bile başkalarının ıstırabını düşünebilendir.
tr_quotes.author: Cemil Sena Ongun

tr_quotes.quote: Elmas nasıl yontulmadan mükemmelleşmezse insanda acı çekmeden olgunlaşmaz.
tr_quotes.author: Konfüçyus

tr_quotes.quote: Geçmişte çektiklerimiz bize çekmekte olduğumuz acılardan daima daha hafif görünür.
tr_quotes.author: Gabriel de Annunzio

tr_quotes.quote: Kendimizde her zaman başkalarının acısına dayanacak gücü buluruz.
tr_quotes.author: François de La Rochefaucauld

tr_quotes.quote: İnsan bir çırak, acılar ise onun efendisidir. Acı çekmedikçe bir insan kendi kendini tanımaz.
tr_quotes.author: Alfred de Musset

tr_quotes.quote: Kendisine ıstırap vermedikleri takdirde bir insan uzuvları olduğunu bilir mi hiç.
tr_quotes.author: Miguel de Unamuno

tr_quotes.quote: Düş kırıklıkları aşağılamalar ve hatalardan alınan dersler insanda bin ustanın öğretisinden daha derin izler bırakır.
tr_quotes.author: John Heinrich Fussli

tr_quotes.quote: Bir pervane gibidir acı, tek farkı insanı alıp götürmez bir yere döner de döner habire.
tr_quotes.author: Peter Handke

tr_quotes.quote: Acı çekmekten mutlu olduğumu söyleyemem ama cesaret kazanmak ve mutlu olmak için acı çekmem gerektiğine inanıyorum.
tr_quotes.author: Carol Burnen

tr_quotes.quote: Çekilen her acının en etkili tesellisi bizden daha fazla acı çeken insanları düşünmektir.
tr_quotes.author: Ernest Renan

en_quotes.quote: Sit with the pain until it passes, and you will be calmer for the next one.
en_quotes.author: Naval Ravikant

en_quotes.quote: Without pain, without sacrifice, we would have nothing.
en_quotes.author: Fight Club

en_quotes.quote: Let go of the past.
en_quotes.author: Robert Greene

en_quotes.quote: Adversity is the first path to truth.
en_quotes.author: Lord Byron

en_quotes.quote: Great things never came from comfort zones.
en_quotes.author: Neil Strauss

en_quotes.quote: Although the world is full of suffering, it is full also of the overcoming of it.
en_quotes.author: Helen Keller

en_quotes.quote: It is always by way of pain one arrives at pleasure.
en_quotes.author: Marquis de Sade

en_quotes.quote: True self-discovery begins where your comfort zone ends.
en_quotes.author: Adam Braun

en_quotes.quote: One word frees us of all the weight and pain of life: that word is love.
en_quotes.author: Sophocles

en_quotes.quote: Turn your wounds into wisdom.
en_quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

en_quotes.quote: New beginnings are often disguised as painful endings.
en_quotes.author: Lao Tzu

en_quotes.quote: You never know how strong you are until being strong is your only choice.
en_quotes.author: Bob Marley

en_quotes.quote: Every pain is a gift. Every pain is an opportunity.
en_quotes.author: Maxime Lagacé

en_quotes.quote: The root of all suffering is attachment.
en_quotes.author: Buddha

en_quotes.quote: What hurts us is what heals us.
en_quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

en_quotes.quote: I can bear any pain as long as it has meaning.
en_quotes.author: Haruki Murakami (1Q84)

en_quotes.quote: Change happens when the pain of staying the same is greater than the pain of change.
en_quotes.author: Tony Robbins

en_quotes.quote: Out of suffering have emerged the strongest souls; the most massive characters are seared with scars.
en_quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

en_quotes.quote: People go through so much pain trying to avoid pain.
en_quotes.author: Neil Strauss

en_quotes.quote: Too many people believe that everything must be pleasurable in life, which makes them constantly search for distractions and short-circuits the learning process.
en_quotes.author: Robert Greene

en_quotes.quote: Most of the gains in life come from suffering in the short term, so you can get paid in the long term.
en_quotes.author: Naval Ravikant

en_quotes.quote: Pain makes me grow. Growing is what I want. Therefore, for me pain is pleasure.
en_quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

en_quotes.quote: Life begins at the end of your comfort zone.
en_quotes.author: Neale Donald Walsch

en_quotes.quote: It is when I struggle that I strengthen. It is when challenged to my core that I learn the depth of who I am.
en_quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

en_quotes.quote: The real man smiles in trouble, gathers strength from distress, and grows brave by reflection.
en_quotes.author: Thomas Paine

en_quotes.quote: The pain will leave once it has finished teaching you.
I’ve learned more from pain than I could’ve ever learned from pleasure.
Failure gave me strength. Pain was my motivation.
en_quotes.author: Michael Jordan

en_quotes.quote: Remember anything you want that’s valuable requires you to break through short-term pain in order to gain long-term pleasure.
en_quotes.author: Tony Robbins

en_quotes.quote: Pain nourishes courage. You can’t be brave if you’ve only had wonderful things happen to you.
en_quotes.author: Mary Tyler Moore

en_quotes.quote: You can’t run away from trouble. There ain’t no place that far.
en_quotes.author: Uncle Remus

en_quotes.quote: You must go through that short-term pain to reach long-term gains. A meaningful life is about growth, not comfort.
en_quotes.author: Maxime Lagacé

en_quotes.quote: The more you reject the past, the more your suffering lasts.
en_quotes.author: Maxime Lagacé

en_quotes.quote: We do survive every moment, after all, except the last one.
en_quotes.author: John Updike

en_quotes.quote: The aim of the wise is not to secure pleasure but to avoid pain.
en_quotes.author: Aristotle

en_quotes.quote: We must embrace pain and burn it as fuel for our journey.
en_quotes.author: Kenji Miyazawa

en_quotes.quote: Pain is a fact. Suffering is a choice.
en_quotes.author: Naval Ravikant

en_quotes.quote: You may have had unfair things happen to you, but the depth of your pain is an indication of the height of your future.
en_quotes.author: Joel Osteen

en_quotes.quote: Behind every beautiful thing, there’s been some kind of pain.
en_quotes.author: Bob Dylan

en_quotes.quote: Pain is inevitable, suffering is optional.
en_quotes.author: Buddha

en_quotes.quote: If you’re going through hell, keep going.
en_quotes.author: Winston Churchill

en_quotes.quote: Nobody can hurt me without my permission.
en_quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

en_quotes.quote: Laugher is the tonic, the relief, the surcease for pain.
en_quotes.author: Charlie Chaplin

en_quotes.quote: The only thing that’s the end of the world is the end of the world.
en_quotes.author: Barack Obama

en_quotes.quote: It is easier to find men who will volunteer to die, than to find those who are willing to endure pain with patience.
en_quotes.author: Julius Caesar

en_quotes.quote: Don’t cry because it’s over, smile because it happened.
en_quotes.author: Ludwig Jacobowski

en_quotes.quote: Nothing pains some people more than having to think.
en_quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr

en_quotes.quote: One thing you can’t hide – is when you’re crippled inside.
en_quotes.author: John Lennon

en_quotes.quote: Life is pain, so live it up while you can.
en_quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

en_quotes.quote: It is only through labor and painful effort, by grim energy and resolute courage, that we move on to better things.
en_quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

en_quotes.quote: We cannot be more sensitive to pleasure without being more sensitive to pain.
en_quotes.author: Alan Watts

en_quotes.quote: Where the wound has been given, there must the cure be found, if anywhere.
en_quotes.author: Jane Austen

en_quotes.quote: Pain introduces you to your highest self.
en_quotes.author: Paul Domenick

en_quotes.quote: Every negative situation contains the possibility for something positive, an opportunity. It is how you look at it that matters.
en_quotes.author: Robert Greene

en_quotes.quote: Pain is constant. You either suffer the pain of discipline, or the pain of regret.
en_quotes.author: Yvan Byeajee

en_quotes.quote: Pain can change you, but that doesn’t mean it has to be a bad change. Take that pain and turn it into wisdom.
There is a thin line that separates laughter and pain, comedy and tragedy, humor and hurt
en_quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

en_quotes.quote: The pain that you create now is always some form of nonacceptance, some form of unconscious resistance to what is.
en_quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

en_quotes.quote: Trying to build a life where you never experience bad feelings is like building a ship that can’t handle a storm.
en_quotes.author: Neil Strauss

en_quotes.quote: When it hurts – observe. Life is trying to teach you something.
en_quotes.author: Anita Krizzan

en_quotes.quote: Acceptance doesn’t mean resignation; it means understanding that something is what it is and that there’s got to be a way through it.
en_quotes.author: Michael J. Fox

en_quotes.quote: Following a path is easy. Creating a new one is tough but it will lead you to new places.
en_quotes.author: Maxime Lagacé

en_quotes.quote: When I planted my pain in the field of patience it bore fruit of happiness.
en_quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

en_quotes.quote: We can learn and change in a state of pain and suffering, or we can evolve in a state of joy and inspiration.
en_quotes.author: Joe Dispenza

en_quotes.quote: If there must be trouble, let it be in my day, that my child may have peace.
en_quotes.author: Thomas Paine

en_quotes.quote: Wisdom is nothing more than healed pain.
en_quotes.author: Robert Gary Lee

en_quotes.quote: Life didn’t promise to be wonderful.
en_quotes.author: Teddy Pendergrass

en_quotes.quote: Neurosis is the natural by-product of pain avoidance.
en_quotes.author: Carl Jung

en_quotes.quote: Life swings like a pendulum backward and forward between pain and boredom.
en_quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

en_quotes.quote: Numbing the pain for a while will make it worse when you finally feel it.
en_quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

en_quotes.quote: The worst wounds, the deadliest of them, aren't the ones people see on the outside. They're the ones that make us bleed internally.
en_quotes.author: Sherrilyn Kenyon

en_quotes.quote: I imagine one of the reasons people cling to their hates so stubbornly is because they sense, once hate is gone, they will be forced to deal with pain.
en_quotes.author: James Baldwin

en_quotes.quote: People go through so much pain trying to avoid pain.
en_quotes.author: Neil Strauss

en_quotes.quote: Sometimes pain was like a storm that came out of nowhere. The clearest summer could end in a downpour. Could end in lightning and thunder.
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Alire Sáenz

en_quotes.quote: Our wounds are often the openings into the best and most beautiful part of us.
en_quotes.author: David Richo

en_quotes.quote: Time doesn’t heal emotional pain, you need to learn how to let go.
en_quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

en_quotes.quote: If you are distressed by anything external, the pain is not due to the thing itself, but to your estimate of it; and this you have the power to revoke at any moment.
en_quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

en_quotes.quote: Sacrifice today for tomorrows betterment, you are willing to pay those payments with pain, because pain is just a message when you are fixing something that’s insufficient in your life.
en_quotes.author: Greg Plitt

en_quotes.quote: We can never judge the lives of others, because each person knows only their own pain and renunciation.
en_quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

en_quotes.quote: Remember anything you want that’s valuable requires you to break through short-term pain in order to gain long-term pleasure.
en_quotes.author: Tony Robbins

en_quotes.quote: Don't be scared... Women can handle the worst kind of pain. You'll find out one day.
en_quotes.author: Gayle Forman

en_quotes.quote: Let me not pray to be sheltered from dangers, but to be fearless in facing them. Let me not beg for the stilling of my pain, but for the heart to conquer it.
en_quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

en_quotes.quote: We must all suffer one of two things: the pain of discipline or the pain of regret or disappointment.
en_quotes.author: Jim Rohn

en_quotes.quote: I suppose that since most of our hurts come through relationships so will our healing, and I know that grace rarely makes sense for those looking in from the outside.
en_quotes.author: Wm. Paul Young

en_quotes.quote: Turn your wounds into wisdom.
en_quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

en_quotes.quote: You may have had unfair things happen to you, but the depth of your pain is an indication of the height of your future.
en_quotes.author: Joel Osteen

en_quotes.quote: There are wounds that never show on the body that are deeper and more hurtful than anything that bleeds.
en_quotes.author: Laurell K. Hamilton

en_quotes.quote: Some old wounds never truly heal, and bleed again at the slightest word.
en_quotes.author: George R.R. Martin

en_quotes.quote: The most painful thing is losing yourself in the process of loving someone too much, and forgetting that you are special too.
en_quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

en_quotes.quote: When pain is over, the remembrance of it often becomes a pleasure.
en_quotes.author: Jane Austen

en_quotes.quote: One thing you can't hide is when you're crippled inside.
en_quotes.author: John Lennon

en_quotes.quote: One word will free us of all the weight and pain of life, that word is love.
en_quotes.author: Sophocles

en_quotes.quote: Behind every beautiful thing, there's some kind of pain.
en_quotes.author: Bob Dylan

en_quotes.quote: Frustration, although quite painful at times, is a very positive and essential part of success.
en_quotes.author: Bo Bennett

en_quotes.quote: Sit with the pain until it passes, and you will be calmer for the next one.
en_quotes.author: Naval Ravikant

en_quotes.quote: He took his pain and turned it into something beautiful. Into something that people connect to. And that's what good music does. It speaks to you. It changes you.
en_quotes.author: Hannah Harrington

en_quotes.quote: Be patient and tough; someday this pain will be useful to you.
en_quotes.author: Ovid

en_quotes.quote: Waiting hurts. Forgetting hurts. But not knowing which decision to take can sometimes be the most painful.
en_quotes.author: José N. Harris

en_quotes.quote: I always hated when my scars started to fade, because as long as I could still see them, I knew why I was hurting.
en_quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

en_quotes.quote: Change happens when the pain of staying the same is greater than the pain of change.
en_quotes.author: Tony Robbins

en_quotes.quote: Find a place inside where there's joy, and the joy will burn out the pain.
en_quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

en_quotes.quote: You need to spend time crawling alone through shadows to truly appreciate what it is to stand in the sun.
en_quotes.author: Shaun Hick

en_quotes.quote: These pains you feel are messengers. Listen to them.
en_quotes.author: Rumi

en_quotes.quote: No matter how far life pushes you down, no matter how much you hurt, you can always bounce back.
Be master of your petty annoyances and conserve your energies for the big, worthwhile things. It isn’t the mountain ahead that wears you out, it’s the grain of sand in your shoe.
en_quotes.author: Robert Service

en_quotes.quote: Often it’s the deepest pain which empowers you to grow into your highest self.

If you can learn to endure pain, you can survive anything. Some people learn to embrace it, to love it. Some endure it through drowning it in sorrow, or by making themselves forget. Others turn it into anger.
en_quotes.author: Sarah J. Maas

en_quotes.quote: Just like there's always time for pain, there's always time for healing.
en_quotes.author: Jennifer Brown

en_quotes.quote: When pain brings you down, don't be silly, don't close your eyes and cry, you just might be in the best position to see the sun shine.
en_quotes.author: Alanis Morissette

en_quotes.quote: When I planted my pain in the field of patience it bore fruit of happiness.
en_quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

en_quotes.quote: The prettiest smile hides the deepest secrets. The prettiest eyes have cried the most tears. And the kindest hearts have felt the most pain
If you're never able to tolerate a little bit of pain and discomfort, you'll never get better.
en_quotes.author: Angela Duckworth

en_quotes.quote: Forgetting about our mistakes and our wounds isn't enough to make them disappear.
en_quotes.author: Ai Yazawa

en_quotes.quote: Your pain is the breaking of the shell that encloses your understanding.
en_quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

en_quotes.quote: The practice of love offers no place of safety. We risk loss, hurt, pain. We risk being acted upon by forces outside our control.
en_quotes.author: Bell Hooks

en_quotes.quote: If danger arises in the present moment, there may be an emotion. There may even be pain. But that's a challenge, not a problem. For a problem to exist, you need time and repetitive mind activity.
en_quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

en_quotes.quote: Many of us spend our whole lives running from feeling with the mistaken belief that you can not bear the pain. But you have already borne the pain. What you have not done is feel all you are beyond that pain.
en_quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

en_quotes.quote: If you are silent about your pain, they’ll kill you and say you enjoyed it.
en_quotes.author: Zora Neale Hurston

en_quotes.quote: God gave us pain to remind us we are alive, so we will learn to value the joys and beauty of the world.
en_quotes.author: Tom Corr

en_quotes.quote: Of pain, you could wish only one thing: that it should stop. Nothing in the world was so bad as physical pain. In the face of pain there are no heroes.
en_quotes.author: George Orwell

en_quotes.quote: The pain and boredom we experience in the initial stage of learning a skill toughens our minds.
en_quotes.author: Robert Greene

en_quotes.quote: Pain introduces you to your highest self.
en_quotes.author: Paul Domenick

en_quotes.quote: Don’t get lost in your pain, know that one day your pain will become your cure.
en_quotes.author: Rumi

en_quotes.quote: Top results are achieved only through pain. But eventually you like this pain.
en_quotes.author: Juha Vaatainen

en_quotes.quote: We must embrace pain and burn it as fuel for our journey.
en_quotes.author: Kenji Miyazawa

en_quotes.quote: Every pain is a gift. Every pain is an opportunity.
en_quotes.author: Maxime Lagacé

en_quotes.quote: The pain of the little finger is felt by the whole body.
en_quotes.author: Filipino Proverb

en_quotes.quote: It is always by way of pain one arrives at pleasure.
en_quotes.author: Marquis de Sade

en_quotes.quote: The pain of the mind is worse than the pain of the body
en_quotes.author: Publilius Syru

en_quotes.quote: Pain is a great motivator.
en_quotes.author: Naval Ravikant

en_quotes.quote: I’m willing to accept any kind of pain to win a race.
en_quotes.author: Rick Wohlhutter

en_quotes.quote: Sometimes pain can drive a man harder than pleasure.
en_quotes.author: Don Ingall

en_quotes.quote: Great things never came from comfort zones.
en_quotes.author: Neil Strauss

en_quotes.quote: All pain is either severe or slight, if slight, it is easily endured; if severe, it will without doubt be brief.
en_quotes.author: Cicero

en_quotes.quote: Suffering is an extraordinary teacher.
en_quotes.author: Ryan Hall

en_quotes.quote: The pain started years ago, but I’d lived with it for so long at that point that I’d accepted it as an inevitable part of me.
en_quotes.author: Diwakar Sharma

en_quotes.quote: The broken heart. You think you will die, but you keep living, day after day after terrible day.
en_quotes.author: Charles Dickens

en_quotes.quote: No matter how far life pushes you down, no matter how much you hurt, you can always bounce back.
en_quotes.author: Sheryl Swoopes

en_quotes.quote: Don’t give up in times of difficulty. Persevere on as there will be an end to these.
en_quotes.author: Edward Dunedin

en_quotes.quote: Anyone can hide. Facing up to things, working through them, that’s what makes you strong.
en_quotes.author: Sarah Dessen

en_quotes.quote: You never know how strong you are… until being strong is the only choice you have.
en_quotes.author: Cayla Mills

en_quotes.quote: Our most beautiful dreams are born from our most unpleasant nightmares.
en_quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

en_quotes.quote: I can bear any pain as long as it has meaning.
en_quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

en_quotes.quote: Smooth seas do not make skillful sailors.
en_quotes.author: African proverb

en_quotes.quote: We do survive every moment, after all, except the last one.
en_quotes.author: John Updike

en_quotes.quote: Without pain, without sacrifice, we would have nothing.
en_quotes.author: Fight Club

en_quotes.quote: No winter lasts forever; no spring skips its tur
en_quotes.author: Hal Borland

en_quotes.quote: Sometimes you must hurt in order to know, fall in order to grow, lose in order to gain, because life’s greatest lessons are learnt through pain.
en_quotes.author: Nagato

en_quotes.quote: Pain nourishes courage. You can’t be brave if you’ve only had wonderful things happen to you.
en_quotes.author: Mary Tyler Moore

en_quotes.quote: Pain has its own noble joy, when it starts a strong consciousness of life, from a stagnant one.
en_quotes.author: John Sterling

en_quotes.quote: No pain, no palm; no thorns, no throne; no gall, no glory; no cross, no crown
en_quotes.author: William Penn
